Introduction: ^Hello, I'm detective Anderson, I'm looking for a girl by the name of Isabel Rosa, does that name ring a bell?
^What is your name, what do you do here?
^Oh sorry, I didn't mean to disturb you. Carry on with your work.
Direct: ^N-no, i've never heard of anyone with that name, please leave me alone. I've got work to do.
^Your boss said to come talk to you, something about a key to a door?
^I found this bloody name tag, care to explain?
Inquire: ^O-oh, my name is Clara, i'm the cleaner here, if you don't mind, I need to get on with my shift.
^Ahh, apologies, i'll let you go then
B_unlock: ^O-oh, well if Vincent has told you, you must be working with him. Don't tell him I said this, but you really don't want to go down there.
^Fuck-sake woman, just give me the damn key!
^you must have misheard me, what I actually said was...
Intimidate: ^Fine, don't say I didn't warn you. (She hands you the key)
C_unlock: ^I-I... (She wordlessly takes out the key and hands it to you) They make me do these things, please be careful
^Better not be anything crazy down there, or I'm gonna start shooting. Starting with you.
Basement: ^I can't say, he'll kill me, you should leave, while you still can.
Vince: ^Oh, that'd be Vince, he's nice. pays me on time, gives me bonuses, there's something wrong with things here though... I shouldn't have said that. Please leave me.
